entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
